typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string ('Manual_Forecast_Pipeline'),
	FileName as string ('MAS_MNL_FORECAST'),
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string ('Date_Tag')
}
source(output(
		Period as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as string,
		Curent_Amount as string,
		Future_Amount as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string,
		CPM_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = 'Manual_Forecast_Pipeline') ~> AddAuditColumns
SelectOutput alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0)) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type = Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Start_Date_Tag,
		End_Date_Tag
	)) ~> InsertRecords
